menu.name: Hobbit Hash
menu.description: Five flapjacks, potatoes, leeks, garlic, cheese.

menu.name: The Full Flapjack Breakfast
menu.description: Eight flapjacks, two sausages, 3 eggs, 4 slices of bacon, beans, and a coffee.

menu.name: Southfarthing Slammer
menu.description: 15 flapjacks and 2 pints of syrup.

menu.name: Beorning Breakfast
menu.description: 6 flapjacks smothers in honey.

menu.name: Shire Strawberry Special
menu.description: 6 flapjacks and a hearty serving of strawberry jam.

menu.name: Buckland Blackberry Breakfast
menu.description: 6 flapjacks covered in fresh blackberries. Served with a large side of sausage.

menu.name: Lembas
menu.description: Three pieces of traditional Elvish Waybread

menu.name: Muffins of the Marish
menu.description: A variety of 8 different types of muffins, served with tea.

menu.name: Hasty Hobbit Hash
menu.description: Potatoes with onions and cheese. Served with coffee.

menu.name: Shepherd's Pie
menu.description: A classic. Includes 3 pies.

menu.name: Roast Pork
menu.description: An entire pig slow-roasted over a fire.

menu.name: Fish and Chips
menu.description: Fish - fried. Chips - nice and crispy.

menu.name: Tea
menu.description: Served with sugar and cream.

menu.name: Coffee
menu.description: Served with sugar and cream.

menu.name: Cookies and Cream
menu.description: A dozen cookies served with a vat of cream.

menu.name: Mixed Berry Pie
menu.description: Fresh baked daily.

menu.name: Po-ta-to Platter
menu.description: Boiled. Mashed. Stuck in a stew.

menu.name: Bree and Apple
menu.description: One wheel of brie with slices of apple.

menu.name: Maggot's Mushroom Mashup
menu.description: It sounds disgusting, but its pretty good

menu.name: Fresh Baked Bread
menu.description: A whole loaf of the finest bread the Shire has to offer.

menu.name: Pint of Ale
menu.description: Yes, it comes in pints.

menu.name: Sausage Sandwich
menu.description: Six whole sausages served on a loaf of bread. Covered in onions, mushrooms and gravy.

menu.name: Shire Supper
menu.description: End the day as you started it, with a dozen flapjacks, 5 eggs, 3 sausages, 7 pieces of bacon, and a pint of ale.
